custom-sql.sql: SELECT (CASE WHEN sum(projectid) >0 THEN true ELSE false END ) as check FROM public.gfbio_project WHERE projectid = ?

SELECT (CASE WHEN sum(gfbio_project_researchobject.projectid) >0 THEN true ELSE false END ) as check FROM public.gfbio_submission, public.gfbio_project_researchobject WHERE gfbio_project_researchobject.researchobjectversion = gfbio_submission.researchobjectversion AND gfbio_project_researchobject.researchobjectid = gfbio_submission.researchobjectid AND gfbio_project_researchobject.projectid = ?
